articles.title: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?. Verizon launches 5G Network Slice Enhanced Internet, offering capped-free high uplink speeds to support AI, cloud apps and enterprise use cases. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Un-carrier Unwrapped 2025
articles.summary: Business Wire: Un-carrier Unwrapped 2025. BELLEVUE, Wash., December 22, 2025--It’s been quite a year for T-Mobile — the kind that makes you want to raise a glass to everything the Un-carrier made possible in 2025. The company officially became America’s Best Network and delivered its strongest quarter in more than a decade. Fast Company named T-Mobile one of the Best Workplaces for Innovators, recognizing a culture built to challenge the status quo.

articles.title: SoftBank Races to Secure $22.5 Billion OpenAI Funding by Year-End
articles.mainIdea: SoftBank Races to Secure $22.5 Billion OpenAI Funding by Year-End
articles.summary: GuruFocus.com: SoftBank Races to Secure $22.5 Billion OpenAI Funding by Year-End. Asset sales, IPO plans, and borrowing options are being used to support SoftBank's OpenAI investment commitment. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA, OPAI.PVT, SFTBF.
